CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 27, 1969, pg. 17 reads: "Exchange Vows - Mr. and Mrs. William Graham Wheaton smile happily as they except the marriage certificate from the Rev. Clarence McFadden after he had performed their recent wedding in Pittsburgh. The bride is the former Helen Robinson, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Alex Robinson.  The groom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Walter J. Wheaton Sr. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Robinson-Wheaton wedding party with three men, three women, boy, and girl, including Gerald Wheaton, far left, groom William Graham Wheaton, center next to bride Helen Robinson Wheaton, and Dolores Wheaton, right, boy, and girl, posed in living room with television, floral sofa, and tiled fireplace
